title: KIM SWITCH / TWINS AND RADIO
description: Fires after you've heard the Twins testimony with Kim. He reveals he knows the station. Weird if true, worth giving them a call.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I believe they heard something," h..."
dialogueTree.text: "I believe they heard something," he says, glancing back at the twins. "And given the poverty of this part of town, I don't know how they could have heard a radio."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't *know* how they heard it,..."
links.text: "I don't *know* how they heard it, but..." He returns his gaze to you. "I know the station they imitated. So they must have heard it somehow."

links.title: You: ""What channel was it?""
links.text: "What channel was it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Speedfreaks FM.""
links.text: "Speedfreaks FM."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "No hesitation. He knows it well. Pr..."
links.text: No hesitation. He knows it well. Probably has the channel saved to his radio.

links.title: You: ""Wait a second. How do you know tha..."
links.text: "Wait a second. How do you know that station?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He pauses. "It's... important in ou..."
links.text: He pauses. "It's... important in our line to know about all sorts of things. I know a little bit about radio culture."

links.title: Drama: "The machinery of his mind is at wor..."
links.text: The machinery of his mind is at work, sire! With swiftness the gears do turn, for to produce *deceit*! He seeks to hide his fondness for his favourite channel, Speedfreaks FM!

links.title: You: ""Are you a fan of the station, Kim?""
links.text: "Are you a fan of the station, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. And my radio habits are not re..."
links.text: "No. And my radio habits are not relevant to this serious murder investigation."

links.title: Drama: "You have seen through the veil he w..."
links.text: You have seen through the veil he would have drawn o're your eyes. Do with this what thou wilt!

links.title: You: ""Radio culture. Sure.""
links.text: "Radio culture. Sure."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." The lieutenant checks his wa..."
links.text: "Mhm." The lieutenant checks his watch. "Anyway."

links.title: You: ""Radio culture, huh? That makes sen..."
links.text: "Radio culture, huh? That makes sense."

links.title: You: ""Speedfreaks FM, huh?""
links.text: "Speedfreaks FM, huh?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah. Local station, known for its..."
links.text: "Yeah. Local station, known for its kinetic music and aggressive style."

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a good time!""
links.text: "Sounds like a good time!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yeah." The lieutenant checks his w..."
links.text: "Yeah." The lieutenant checks his watch. "Anyway."

links.title: Composure: "The lieutenant isn't usually a man..."
links.text: The lieutenant isn't usually a man who checks his watch without reason. He was trying to stay cool. Don't push now -- keep an eye out for it again later.

links.title: You: ""Sounds a bit rough for me. I like..."
links.text: "Sounds a bit rough for me. I like tenderness in my radio, I think."

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a station for idiots.""
links.text: "Sounds like a station for idiots."

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So. Those voices they heard...""

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Yes, of course! Earlier, when you t..."
links.text: Yes, of course! Earlier, when you turned the radio on in his Kineema!

links.title: Volition: "Don't."
links.text: Don't.

links.title: You: ""Speedfreaks FM! Your favourite cha..."
links.text: "Speedfreaks FM! Your favourite channel!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant breathes steadily, e..."
links.text: The lieutenant breathes steadily, each inhalation and exhalation controlled.

links.title: Volition: "He was clearly uncomfortable discus..."
links.text: He was clearly uncomfortable discussing it before. He still is. You have nothing to gain from pushing his buttons.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't explain how they heard it,..."
links.text: "I can't explain how they heard it," he says, ignoring your comment. "I believe they heard something. And given the poverty of this part of town, I don't know how they could have heard a radio. However..."

links.title: You: ""Wasn't your radio tuned into Speed..."
links.text: "Wasn't your radio tuned into Speedfreaks FM?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You must be mistaken," the lieuten..."
links.text: "You must be mistaken," the lieutenant says in a calm, measured tone. "Anyway."

links.title: Logic: "A calculated response. To say *why..."
links.text: A calculated response. To say *why the hell did you snoop on my radio?* would be reasonable -- but it would confirm he likes the station. Instead, he dismisses it. He must be embarrassed by his affection for Speedfreaks FM.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't explain how they heard it,..."
links.text: "I can't explain how they heard it," the lieutenant continues unabated. "I believe they heard something. And given the poverty of this part of town, I don't know how they could have heard a radio. However..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Weird as it is, this situation is..."
links.text: "Weird as it is, this situation is not connected to the murder. This isn't our business."

links.title: You: ""Are you just embarrassed that we m..."
links.text: "Are you just embarrassed that we may have to contact Speedfreaks FM?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." His answer is immediate. "I j..."
links.text: "No." His answer is immediate. "I just... don't see how this furthers our investigation into a murder. That's all."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "An ocean breeze blows in strong. He..."
links.text: An ocean breeze blows in strong. He raises his jacket collar against it.

links.title: You: ""I suspect you're embarrassed to ca..."
links.text: "I suspect you're embarrassed to call Speedfreaks FM, Kim."

links.title: You: ""It's a mystery though. Mysteries a..."
links.text: "It's a mystery though. Mysteries are our business."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Mysteries like *who killed th..."
links.text: "Yes. Mysteries like *who killed the hanged man* are our business. Not this..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Besides. Maybe it was just a radio..."
links.text: "Besides. Maybe it was just a radio they overheard -- they might not be old enough to know the difference. How would they have heard the voices?"

links.title: You: ""Even if it was a radio, where was..."
links.text: "Even if it was a radio, where was it coming from?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs."
links.text: The lieutenant shrugs.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's at least rule out radios bef..."
links.text: "Let's at least rule out radios before continuing. Maybe the twins didn't know it was a radio they were hearing..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The washerwoman seems to know ever..."
links.text: "The washerwoman seems to know everything that happens here. Let's ask if she heard anything, before moving on."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After you." The lieutenant gesture..."
links.text: "After you." The lieutenant gestures toward the old woman.

links.title: You: ""Didn't Ruby have advanced radio kn..."
links.text: "Didn't Ruby have advanced radio know-how?"

links.title: You: ""Maybe they're psychic recruit mate..."
links.text: "Maybe they're psychic recruit material for the Remote Viewers Division?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You're not going to try to rec..."
links.text: "No. You're not going to try to recruit the twins to the Remote Viewers Division..."

links.title: You: ""Maybe it has something to do with..."
links.text: "Maybe it has something to do with the mass call-in *radio* game?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That doesn't seem likely to me.""
links.text: "That doesn't seem likely to me."

links.title: You: ""Entroponetic crosstalk?""
links.text: "Entroponetic crosstalk?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If it was... that can't be it." Th..."
links.text: "If it was... that can't be it." The lieutenant frowns.

links.title: You: ""Maybe it's related to what happene..."
links.text: "Maybe it's related to what happened in the church -- Soona's experiment..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is grimly silent."
links.text: The lieutenant is grimly silent.

links.title: You: "(Cough under your breath.) "Seolite..."
links.text: (Cough under your breath.) "Seolite spy-tech."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're going to stay focused on the..."
links.text: "We're going to stay focused on the *case*, officer," the lieutenant says, words heavy with anger.

links.title: You: ""I got nothing.""
links.text: "I got nothing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither do I." He sighs."
links.text: "Neither do I." He sighs.

links.title: You: ""But it is related, Kim. The wind t..."
links.text: "But it is related, Kim. The wind told me so."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant says nothing. An oce..."
links.text: The lieutenant says nothing. An ocean breeze blows in strong. He raises his jacket collar against it.
